meanings.sent1: The playground was chaotic with the little hellions running around.
meanings.sent2: The teacher had a hard time controlling the class full of energetic hellions.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous hellions decided to play a prank on their teacher by hiding her chalk.
meanings.sent4: The neighborhood was filled with the sounds of the playful hellions enjoying their summer break.
meanings.sent5: The mischievous hellions left a trail of toys and laughter wherever they went.

meanings.definition: A group of rowdy or unruly individuals
meanings.sent1: The bar was suddenly filled with loud hellions causing a commotion.
meanings.sent2: The rowdy hellions at the concert were jumping and shouting with excitement.
meanings.sent3: The group of unruly hellions decided to crash the quiet picnic in the park.
meanings.sent4: The rowdy hellions stormed into the party, bringing a burst of energy with them.
meanings.sent5: The rowdy hellions were like a whirlwind of chaos wherever they went.
